meanings.definition: The quality or state of being erosive.
meanings.sent1: The erosivities of the riverbanks led to significant soil erosion.
meanings.sent2: The erosivities of the cliffs along the coast are evident from the gradual wear and tear.
meanings.sent3: The erosivities of the wind on the sand dunes created interesting patterns.
meanings.sent4: The erosivities of time on ancient ruins can be seen in the weathered stones.
meanings.sent5: The erosivities of the waves against the rocks sculpted the shoreline over centuries.
